definition: to laugh one's head off/ridiculous/jaw-dropping
laugh/smile/CL:個|个[ge4]

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
tooth/ivory/CL:顆|颗[ke1]

sentences.english: If you would have told me that before CES, I probably would have laughed my head off.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在CES之前告訴我這些，我也許會笑掉大牙。

sentences.english: I didn't tell George when he came home. Or he'd have laughed his head off.
sentences.chinese: 喬治回家時我沒敢告訴他，否則他會笑掉大牙的。

sentences.english: Employees are likely to laugh their tails off at any boss who cites this drivel as inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 老闆要把這一派胡言奉爲靈感，僱員可能會笑掉大牙。

sentences.english: I am sure the iCon Mr Jobs is laughing his head off.
sentences.chinese: 世界上有那麼多的傻瓜，喬布斯先生會笑掉大牙。

sentences.english: I was laughed out of twelve interviews today.
sentences.chinese: 今天十二個面試我都讓人笑掉大牙了。

definition: to sneer at sb/to ridicule
to make a fool of oneself/to make oneself a laughing stock
to be the most ridiculous thing in the world (idiom)
pinyin: hua2 tian1 xia4 zhi1 da4 ji1

definition: lit. for one's face to reach rock bottom/to be thoroughly discredited (idiom)
to split one's sides laughing
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
joke/jest/CL:個|个[ge4]/to laugh at/to mock
to criticize behind sb's back/back-biting
a matter for ridicule/an object of ridicule/laughingstock
to make a fool of oneself
(coll.) to burst out laughing
to lose face
lit. if you can't eat it all, you'll have to take it home (idiom)/fig. you'll have to take the consequences
pinyin: chi1 bu5 liao3 dou1 zhe5 zou3

definition: to be scared out of one's wits/to scare stiff
to move a stone and stub one's toe/to shoot oneself in the foot (idiom)
pinyin: ban1 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3

definition: to lose face
